CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Audio Effects
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable the Android audio effects engine for CalcTunes playback

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Car Mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Open CalcTunes automatically when a Bluetooth A2DP device connects

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Headphones Mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Open CalcTunes automatically when a wired headset is connected

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatic Close
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Close CalcTunes automatically if the device that opened it is disconnected

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Background Service Only
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If checked, only opens the CalcTunes playback service; if unchecked, opens the app's main window

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatically Start Playback
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If checked, will start playback immediately when CalcTunes is automatically started by connecting a device

EditTextPreference.android:title: Automatic Playback Source Library
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The name of the library source to automatically start playback from

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show Ongoing Notification
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show an ongoing notification when background service running

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Small Screen Layout
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Re-arranges the Now Playing bar to fit small screens better
